name: Catalyst Investments
overview: Catalyst Investments L.P. is the venture capital and private equity investment arm of Cukierman & Co. Investment House Ltd specializing in investments in companies that are in pre-IPO, expansion, buyout, turnaround, and distressed situations. The firm prefers to invest in mature, late stage technology-related companies. It which also invests in publicly traded companies. The firm typically invests in telecommunication, information technologies, enterprise software, medical devices and bio/pharma. It primarily invests in mature Israeli companies but would also consider opportunities in Europe. Catalyst Investments L.P. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel with an additional office in London, United Kingdom.
